EmailTemplate.subject: If you use MyAerospace.com then you’re missing out...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MyAerospace_Conversion]]> <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MyAerospace_Conversion]]> Dear Customer,
We know that you are an active user on MyAerospace.com <[[https://godirecttrade.com/customer/account/login?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MyAerospace_Conversion]]>, so you must be interested in aerospace parts. Did you know that Honeywell has launched a revolutionary platform called GoDirect Trade for used and new surplus aerospace parts? We’re the Amazon of aerospace and we’re bringing an unprecedented level of transparency to our customers.
The good news? Because you are already a MyAerospace.com user, you already have an automatic login for GoDirect™ Trade <[[https://godirecttrade.com/customer/account/login?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MyAerospace_Conversion]]>. Sign into GoDirect Trade today using your existing MyAerospace name and password. It can’t get any easier than that.
Sign in now and see why Forbes, The Wall Street Journal and Yahoo! Finance are all talking about our marketplace.
SIGN IN WITH YOUR EXISTING PASSWORD <https://godirecttrade.com/customer/account/login?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MyAerospace_Conversion>
Best regards,
Lisa Butters GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=MyAerospace_Conversion]]>
